question: Summarize the contractual, governance, change-control, evaluation, and compliance constraints and requirements that bidders must follow for the HDIMS 재구축사업 (Phase 3) as specified in the RFP.
ground_truth: The requirements include: 1) Contracting method and procurement rules: the project will be awarded by limited competitive bidding (negotiated contract) in accordance with the Enforcement Decree of the Act on Contracts to which the State is a Party (국가를 당사자로 하는 계약에 관한 법률 시행령 제43조). 2) Project duration: the contractor must complete the work within 300 days counted from the contract date; the period is set according to the "appropriate project duration" rules in the Software Business Management and Supervision Guidelines (과학기술정보통신부 고시 · 소프트웨어사업 관리감독에 관한 일반기준, 제4조의2). 3) Governance / task confirmation: the project has followed the Software Promotion Act procedures for task-content confirmation — a 과업심의위원회 (task-review committee) was held (indicated as 개최 in the document) in accordance with Software Promotion Act Article 50 for confirming the statement of work. 4) Change-control process: if changes to the statement of work require adjustments to contract amount or period (per Software Promotion Act Article 50 and Enforcement Decree Article 47(1) items 2 and 3), the contractor must submit a "software project change request" (소프트웨어사업 과업변경요청서) to the agency head and may request convening the task-review committee; the prescribed form (별지 제13호 서식) from the Software Project Contract & Supervision Guidelines must be used. 5) Impact assessment compliance: the project performed a prior software project impact assessment as required by the Software Promotion Act (Article 43) and Enforcement Decree (Articles 35–37) and per the related guidelines (Software Project Contract & Supervision Guidelines, Articles 5 and 6). 6) Bid/offer modifications: any modifications related to bidding must be coordinated and processed through the contracting (contract) department (입찰관련 수정사항은 계약부서와 협의하여 진행). 7) Evaluation methodology and weighting: proposals will be evaluated using both technical and price evaluations to produce a composite score; technical evaluation carries 90% weight and price evaluation 10%. 8) Budget disclosure: the project budget is stated (￦493,270,440 including VAT) and must be considered in proposal/price planning. 9) Documentation and forms: bidders must follow provided submission formats and appendices (붙임 서식) referenced in the RFP when preparing requests, proposals, or change forms. 10) Applicability of software-specific rules: the project is explicitly governed by the Software Promotion Act and related implementation guidelines and is treated as a software development project subject to those statutory and guideline requirements (affecting duration calculation, impact assessment, change control, and contract management).

question: 제안서의 기술평가 구성과 평가방법(정량·정성평가), PM 대면평가 요구사항 및 입찰 제출·평가 관련 주요 절차·제약사항을 종합적으로 설명하라. (기술·가격 배점, 등급별 점수환산, 정량/정성 평가 기준, PM 대면평가 내용·배점, 제출·전자입찰 요건, 공동수급체·컨설턴트Pool 등록 관련 제약 등)
ground_truth:
요구사항 및 평가절차 요약: 1) 평가 전반 구성 및 배점
   - 기술평가 90%, 입찰가격평가 10%로 평가(기술중시형 사업).
   - 기술·가격 배점은 기획재정부 예규에 따라 총 배점 한도를 20점 범위 내에서 조정 가능.
2) 평가위원회 및 평가 주체
   - 평가위원회는 당행 내규에 따라 구성.
   - 정량평가는 제안서 및 증빙서류를 기반으로 입찰 담당부서에서 수행.
3) 기술평가 방식(등급·환산)
   - 세부항목별로 5등급(A, B, C, D, E)으로 평가.
   - 등급별 점수환산: A=배점의 100%, B=90%, C=80%, D=70%, E=60% (예: 배점 10점 → A:10, B:9, C:8, D:7, E:6).
4) 정량평가(내용)
   - 유사사업 수행실적, 참여인력의 경력 등 항목별 정량평가기준 적용(세부기준은 제안요청서 내 정량평가기준표에 따름).
5) 정성평가(내용)
   - 참여기관수에 따른 등급배분표(참고1)를 이용한 상대평가 방식 적용.
6) PM 대면평가(면접)의 성격 및 절차
   - PM 대면평가는 제출한 입찰제안서 각 항목에 대해 사업이해도, 수행계획 등 관련 질의응답을 실시하여 평가위원들이 절대평가.
   - PM 대면평가 총 배점은 10점이며, 그 중 '영어구사능력' 항목에 4점 배정.
   - PM의 영어구사능력 평가는 영어 프레젠테이션(별도 PPT 불필요) 후 질의응답으로 진행.
7) 입찰·제출 절차 및 전자입찰 요건
   - 기술제안서는 지정된 기한(문서에 명시)까지 한국수출입은행 본점 1층 로비에 직접 방문 제출(우편접수 불가).
   - 가격입찰은 국가종합전자조달시스템(나라장터)을 통해 전자입찰만 가능하며, 가격산출근거서(서식10 및 11)를 첨부해야 함.
   - 가격입찰 기간과 기술제안서 제출기한은 별도 지정되어 있으며, 개찰은 제안서 기술평가 후 실시.
   - 가격입찰서와 제안서 중 어느 하나라도 미제출 시 입찰 무효.
   - 면세사업자라도 부가가치세를 포함한 금액으로 제출해야 함.
   - 전자입찰 관련 지문인식 신원확인 규정 안내(지문등록 없어도 고시 특례에 따라 참가 가능).
8) 공동수급체 관련 제약·평가영향
   - 공동수급체는 각 참여사가 '건축', 'ITS 현장시스템', 'ICT' 분야 중 최소 1개 분야 담당해야 함.
   - 건축분야는 업체 실적 정량평가 대상에서 제외되나, 교통운영센터 건축 담당 책임 인력은 정량평가 대상임.
   - 공동수급체 대표자 또는 구성원에 부도·부정당업자 제재·영업정지 등의 결격사유가 있을 경우 평가상 감점 또는 결격 처리(제안서 평가 종료 후 해당 사실이 확인되어도 재평가 대상).
   - 결격사유가 있는 구성원의 출자·분담비율은 기술능력평가점수에서 환산비율만큼 감점 적용.
9) 컨설턴트 Pool 등록 및 참여자격 관련 제약
   - 입찰참가자는 입찰평가결과 통보 전에 당행 컨설턴트 Pool(EDCF)에 등록해야 함(토목-도로, ICT, 건축 분야 중 해당 분야 등록).
   - 공동수급체의 경우 모든 참여 업체 및 기관이 등록해야 함.
   - 제안서 제출 전에 컨설턴트 Pool 등록을 권고하며, 제출 이후에도 미등록 상태가 지속되면 협상적격자에서 제외될 수 있음.
10) 제안서의 객관성 및 증빙 의무
   - 제안서의 모든 기재사항은 객관적으로 입증 가능한 자료를 별첨으로 제출해야 함.
   - 허위 기재 또는 단순 추정·예상으로 작성된 제안서는 심사 대상에서 제외될 수 있음.
11) 기타 법적·절차적 제약
   - 입찰참가자는 관련 법령(국가계약법 등)에 따른 유자격자여야 하고, 부정당업자 등에 해당하지 않아야 함.
   - 낙찰자가 정당한 사유 없이 계약을 체결하지 않을 경우 입찰보증금 귀속 등의 제재가 있음.
   - 필요 시 평가를 위해 추가자료 요청 또는 현지실사에 응해야 함.

참고: 구체적인 정량평가 세부항목별 배점표 및 정성평가 등급배분표 등은 제안요청서의 해당 페이지(유사사업 수행실적 등) 및 별첨의 세부기준을 따름.

question: Summarize all functional, interface, data-migration, security, testing, deliverable, vendor-prerequisite, and evaluation constraints the RFP requires for the ERP and Groupware function upgrades (covering PMS, 예산/회계/지출, 인사·급여·복무·근태·교육, 구매·계약·자산, 공통기능, 감사, and groupware customizations).
ground_truth: The requirements include: 1) General procurement/prerequisites: a) The solution must be based on a commercially available (package) product; the proposer must demonstrate prior experience with the package and submit manufacturer/vendor product supply and technical-support commitment letters for each commercial software delivered. b) Proposers must comply with relevant laws and contract rules; if project scope changes are needed, the contractor may request a 과업심의위원회 (task-review committee) per the Software Promotion Act procedures. c) The proposal must include plans for technology transfer, a training plan, and a maintenance/support plan sufficient for system operation and upkeep. d) Existing system HW/SW and application inventories are available for on-site review under a security NDA with the contracting authority's staff. 2) Functional requirements — ERP (module-specific): a) PMS (Project/Business Management System): implement PMS module and an integrated dashboard that supports multi-level display (separate levels for detailed sub-projects and purchase-contract–generated details). The dashboard must display monetary fields (e.g., proposal amount, cause/action amount, disbursement amount) and visualize metrics such as project budget execution rate, remaining time to project end, work-plan progress rate, and cumulative progress provided at work-plan registration. Querying and aggregation criteria must be configurable. b) Business basic information management: register initial project attributes (e.g., strategic tasks, project types, work by type such as service/design/construction/supervision/supplies/land) to enable standard/common and specialized workflows and to drive the integrated dashboard and visual indicators (execution rate, progress, suspension status). c) Change-contract / procurement flexibility: enhance purchase/contract functions to manage procurement activities and change-contract procedures (e.g., allow changes to sub-projects, budget items, vendors, goods and amounts for government-supplied materials) and support flexible handling of modifications and price/quantity changes. d) Budget management: provide enhanced handling for carryover (연차사업 이월), and improved expenditure/revenue management. e) Accounting/expenditure: enhance core accounting features (master data management, budget execution proposals, income/expenditure management, accounting management, corporate card usage records, IFRS-related functions). f) HR/payroll/education: improve training management, career-certificate form, and batch distribution (contract document) features and support customizations. g) 복무/근태/교육 (attendance/leave/education): provide ERP data view tables and define two-way (bi-directional) data interfaces so a specialist attendance solution can be added; supply view tables for attendance and duty-management data. h) Procurement/contract/asset: enhance purchase performance, contract, asset management, inspection/acceptance, and project-management functions. i) Common functions: improve code-management for batch distribution (contract document) capabilities. j) Audit: add daily-audit opinion functionality. 3) Functional requirements — Groupware customizations: a) Customize interfaces and electronic-approval features to improve usability per user requirements. b) Develop a daily-audit opinion form usable in the web Hangul (HWP) drafting editor. c) Add an approval type '합의' (agreement) for department-level sign-off to improve income/expenditure resolution workflows. 4) Interface & data requirements: a) Implement interfaces between ERP and groupware and other institutional systems (e.g., safety/occupational-health systems), including definition and delivery of dedicated data view tables for such interfaces. b) For attendance, provide view tables and define bidirectional data interfaces to support an external attendance solution. c) Ensure interface specifications (data views, mappings, and protocols) are provided for future integrations (project mentions that future linkage to project-management systems, website, etc., must be considered). 5) Data migration & integrity: a) Existing system data must be migrated to the new system without conflicts or errors; legacy data must remain operable and be preserved. b) The proposer must present a migration plan ensuring continuity and integrity of existing data. 6) Non-functional / security / quality attributes: a) Security vulnerability improvements: develop functions to secure extensibility, portability/compatibility (범용성), stability, and responsiveness (speed). b) The RFP requires specifications to control confidentiality and integrity of information assets and to control access to data, functions, and operations (i.e., operational access controls). c) The proposer must describe system conditions for trial/normal operation, organizational and security countermeasures. 7) Performance & testing: a) The system must include performance testing of introduced equipment or constructed system to verify operation against planned objectives. b) Deliver unit and integration test results (단위 통합시험 결과서) and provide appropriate test evidence. c) The RFP categorizes nonfunctional requirements including timing, throughput, and resource-usage limits; proposers must document these system performance constraints. 8) Project management, documentation & deliverables: a) Provide project execution plans and stage-by-stage implementation methods. b) Deliverables explicitly listed: 사업수행계획서 (project execution plan), 요구사항 정의서 (requirements definition), 사용자 인터페이스 설계서 (UI design), 단위·통합시험 결과서 (unit/integration test reports), 운영 및 사용자 매뉴얼 (operation and user manuals), and 개발완료보고서 (development completion report). c) Provide evidence of development artifacts linked to each module (e.g., UI designs, requirement specs, test results). 9) Operational support & training: a) Include concrete technical-transfer activities, education/training plans, and ongoing maintenance/support arrangements as part of the proposal to ensure smooth operation after deployment. 10) Evaluation & contracting constraints: a) Contracting method is a restricted competitive (negotiated) bid and proposers must adhere to contract rules. b) Proposal must demonstrate the proposer’s ability to perform the package-based implementation, and technical evaluation will be the major criterion (technical 90%, price 10% as stated).

question: List all requirement categories defined in the RFP for the UICC system function improvement, giving the number of requirements in each category and enumerating the specific requirement items (codes and names) as they appear in the document. If the document contains any anomalies or truncation in the requirements list, note them.
ground_truth:
The requirements include a total of 59 items across the following categories (as shown in the RFP):

1) Functional Requirements (SFR) — 9 items:
   - SFR-001 공통사항
   - SFR-002 입력 데이터 기능
   - SFR-003 집계현황 기능
   - SFR-004 시스템 관리자 기능
   - SFR-005 사용자 관리 및 담당자 지정 기능 개선
   - SFR-006 실태조사 항목 지침 개선사항 반영
   - SFR-007 온라인 보고서 기능
   - SFR-008 대학정보공시 연계 기능

question: What are the detailed technical and data requirements specified in the RFP for implementing the liquid-release (액체) dose assessment feature in both the Fortran module and the web system, including required exposure pathways, evaluation targets, UI inputs, outputs, and database items?
ground_truth: The requirements include: 1) Fortran module (SFR-003): implementation of liquid-release dose assessment that performs pathway-specific dose evaluations. Required exposure pathways: external exposure (examples given: beach activities, water activities) and internal exposure (examples given: seafood ingestion, drinking-water ingestion, irrigated-crop ingestion). Required evaluation targets: individual (personal) dose and collective (group) dose. 2) Web system (SFR-004): build UI and back-end support for liquid-release dose assessment. UI inputs must include source-term inputs (nuclide, release amount/quantity, re-concentration factor) and site-characteristic & socio-environmental inputs (dilution volume, dilution factor, ingestion/intake amounts, production amounts, activity time, transport time, etc.). Web outputs must present pathway-specific dose results and comparison to standards/criteria. 3) Database requirements (SFR-004 DB 구축): construct and populate DB tables for bioaccumulation/biota concentration factors (생체축적인자), dose conversion / dose-per-unit intake factors (선량환산인자), and site-characteristic & socio-environmental parameters (부지특성인자 및 사회환경인자). 4) Common expectations: both Fortran module and web system must produce pathway-by-pathway dose results and support both individual and collective dose evaluations as specified. These items are to be integrated so that source-term and environmental parameter inputs (via the web UI and stored DB) feed the Fortran module calculations and the web UI displays dose outputs and standard comparisons.

question: What are the detailed technical and process requirements for the e나라도움 web accessibility consulting project, including diagnostic standards and methods, required deliverables, quality-management and testing constraints (including involvement of users with severe visual impairment), integration with subsequent maintenance, training requirements, and any security/access constraints to the system infrastructure?
ground_truth: The requirements include: 1) Diagnostic standard and scope: follow '한국형 웹 콘텐츠 접근성 지침 2.2' (Dec. 2022) and evaluate e나라도움 against the level of scrutiny expected of a 품질인증기관 (quality certification body). 2) Inspection items and evaluation method: perform a manual, cross-checked evaluation across 33 검사 항목 (33 inspection/test items). Use two expert groups (2개 그룹) to carry out cross manual (수동) evaluations and determine levels/coverage. 3) Deliverables from diagnosis and consulting: produce a comprehensive diagnostic report that includes benchmarking to other institutions' best practices, system diagnosis, identified problems, concrete improvement plans, 품질관리 방향 (quality-management direction), expected effects, and key implications (시사점). 4) Detailed improvement guidance: derive specific web-accessibility feature improvements and concrete remediation/action guides that comply with web standards (웹 표준가이드 준수). These guides must be detailed enough to be incorporated into the e나라도움 maintenance work (scheduled for 하반기) and must support monitoring and post-change management during implementation. 5) Phased project structure and timing constraints: conduct the work within a two-phase approach during the contract period — Phase 1: diagnosis and consulting (진단 및 컨설팅); Phase 2: quality management and education (품질관리 및 교육). The consulting must consider the need to produce outputs that will be reflected in the later maintenance contract. 6) Quality management and pre-certification testing: establish an internal evaluation team/자체 평가단 whose procedures are equivalent to 국가공인 웹 접근성 인증 심사 (nationally recognized accessibility certification) to perform pre-verification. 7) Inclusion of people with severe visual impairments: recruit an evaluation panel that includes people with severe visual impairment (중증 시각장애인 — 전맹, 저시력 등) and conduct accessibility tests and system-satisfaction surveys under the same conditions as certification testing. 8) Usability/satisfaction measurement: perform system satisfaction surveys alongside accessibility testing to assess user experience for information-vulnerable groups (장애인, 고령자 등). 9) Integration with maintenance and monitoring: ensure remediation items and action guides are formatted and scoped for incorporation into the scheduled 하반기 유지보수 사업; include monitoring and 사후 관리 (post-implementation monitoring) during remediation work. 10) Training and knowledge transfer: provide operator training for 발주기관 사업담당자 to enable sustained accessibility management — transfer of specialist technical know-how, latest trends, and related matters. Details such as training targets, timing, and number of sessions are to be mutually agreed (상호협의). 11) System scope and testing contexts: include both 행정망 and 인터넷망 instances of the e나라도움 업무시스템 and cover major portals, business-management modules, mobile interfaces, and linked components as included in the system 구성 (포털, 보조사업관리, 사업수행관리, 집행관리, 정산관리, 통합연계, 모바일 등). 12) Security and access constraints: infrastructure operation details (네트워크, 시스템 등) are sensitive and access to such information is restricted to on-site viewing only (방문 열람만 가능) per 행정기관 및 공공기관 정보시스템 구축·운영 지침 (행안부 고시 제2023-27호) 제17조; the consultant must plan diagnostics/testing under these access constraints and follow the stated 보안사항. 13) Reporting of outcomes for procurement/contract compliance: the outputs must support legal and procurement requirements (사업운영 방안 및 관련 규정 준수) and be detailed enough to feed the proposal/발주 프로세스 and subsequent maintenance contract work.

question: What are the specific technical, architectural, testing, security, and project constraints/requirements that must be satisfied to implement the KCMVP (국정원 검증필 암호모듈) security module and related functionality for the 전기안전 관제시스템, including required servers, middleware, protocols, development/test environment, deliverables to device manufacturers, and compliance/management conditions?
ground_truth: The requirements include: 1) Cryptographic module and compliance: 1.1. Adopt a 국가정보원 검증필 암호모듈 (KCMVP) for communications between the 전기안전 관제시스템 and remote inspection devices to meet IoT standard security 규격 and 전기안전관리법 제12조의2 requirements. 1.2. Comply with 암호모듈 도입 준수사항 (COR-002) and 보안 취약점 개선 준수사항 (COR-003). 2) Server and software deployment: 2.1. Provide KCMVP security module software (quantity: 1조). 2.2. Deploy KCMVP on two new communication servers (통신서버 2식) that collect/preprocess data from remote devices (KCMVP module applied). 2.3. Deploy KCMVP on one test-bed server (테스트 베드서버 1식) used for device integration/function verification (KCMVP module applied). 2.4. Servers must run an OS version compatible with the security module (OS (보안모듈 호환버전) requirement). 2.5. The 공사 will bear cloud costs for the information system (KT 클라우드 운용 noted). 3) Messaging middleware and protocols: 3.1. Configure MQTT Broker on the new communication servers and the test server. 3.2. RabbitMQ 3.8.34 is specified for MQTT Broker (installation version to be agreed with the 공사). 3.3. Use TLS for communications (공사 TLS 규격 defined in the 원격점검장치 통합시험 매뉴얼); diagram indicates TLS/MQTT over port 8883 for out-stream. 3.4. Remote devices operate as MQTT clients and must interoperate with the broker using the secured TLS/KCMVP stack. 4) Functional development and system features: 4.1. Develop and apply communication (연동) and data linkage 규격 between 관제서버 and devices (SFR-002). 4.2. Implement control-system features including 지도형 대시보드 (map-based dashboard), 구독형 서비스 (subscription service), 통신서버 이원화 (redundant/dual communication servers), and 기타 기능 개선 (SFR-004 ~ SFR-007). 4.3. Apply developed 기능 to production servers (SFR-003). 5) Development & integration environment: 5.1. Existing/target stack details noted: WEB (Apache 2.4.6), WAS (Tomcat 7.0.99), DB (MySQL 8.0.33). 5.2. MQTT Broker software: RabbitMQ 3.8.34 (신규 설치). 5.3. Ensure compatibility and interoperability with existing systems (COR-001 기존 시스템 호환). 6) Testing, verification, and acceptance: 6.1. Establish and execute 테스트 수행방안 (TER-001) and 장애 대응 테스트 (TER-002). 6.2. Conduct integration tests per the 원격점검장치 통합시험 매뉴얼 using the test-bed server and apply KCMVP during tests. 6.3. Perform 테스트 및 검수, 시범운영 및 안정화 as part of the project schedule. 7) Deliverables, training and support to device manufacturers: 7.1. Provide development-method consulting (매뉴얼) and 교육 지원 to remote-device manufacturers so their devices can communicate and exchange data with the 관제서버. 7.2. Produce 사용자 교육, 보고서, 매뉴얼 작성 (PSR-003, PSR-005) and 기술지원 (PSR-004). 8) Project management and operational constraints: 8.1. Project period: 계약 후 180일. 8.2. Budget: 220,000천원 (VAT 포함). 8.3. Project management requirements include 투입 인력운영, 사업관리자(PM) 자격, 안정화 운영 지원 인력, 관리방법론, 위험관리, 장애관리, 정기·수시보고, 산출물 관리, 검수 및 검사, 참여인력 보안서약 등 (PMR-001 ~ PMR-012). 8.4. Provide 안정화 운영 지원 and 하자보수 일반 after deployment (PSR-001, PSR-002). 9) Security & personnel controls: 9.1. Manage 사업진행 보안관리 and 투입인력 보안관리 (SER-001, SER-002). 9.2. Require 보안서약서, 보안각서 and other annexed security documents for proposal/participation (별지 서식 8, 9). 10) Compliance, IP and penalties: 10.1. Adhere to 지식재산권 관리 및 책임 (COR-004) and 손해배상·위약금 부과 기준 (COR-005). 11) Expected outcomes (as targets): 11.1. Strengthened data safety between 관제시스템 and remote devices, improved safety and implementation conformity of remote-device cryptographic modules, and enhanced operational efficiency of the 관제시스템.

question: Summarize the full scope of work and the functional and non-functional requirements specified for the '해외지식재산센터 사업관리 시스템 기능개선' project, including required system modules, user roles and interfaces, data/consultation management and reporting features, deployment and integration constraints, procurement/evaluation constraints, and post-deployment maintenance/support obligations.
ground_truth: The requirements include: 1) Project scope and main modules to be developed: a) Support-project management module: unified application management for 해외 현지 법률서비스 지원사업 covering 공고관리, 선정·심사, 사업 수행관리, 회원관리, 공고별 사업실적 관리; b) Applicant services: 개인정보 입력 기반 회원가입, 사업정보 조회, 신청(온라인 작성 지원 for annually changing 사업유형), 만족도 조사, 관련 자료 업로드; c) 수행대리인 services: 사업정보 조회, 신청서 제출 및 관련 자료 업로드 기능; d) Administrator system: 관리자 전용 화면(s) with 통합 실적 통계·분석 및 관리 기능; e) 상담 관리 module: 지재권 상담 및 법률 자문 일지 등록, 상담 통계 분석, 오프라인 상담 이력 통합(온라인 적재 지원), 실시간 온라인 상담 업무 기록 관리; f) 온라인 상담창구: 시스템 회원 대상 게시판 기능, 자주묻는질문(FAQ) 게시판; g) Convenience features for business management: 각종 업무용 엑셀 다운로드, 제출서류 일괄 다운로드; h) Final deliverables: 최종 산출내역서 제출 requirement. 2) User roles and interface requirements: a) Separate/customized access screens per user role: 시스템 사용자/관리자/신청인/수행대리인; b) Member-facing online application interface must support flexible, web-based construction of 신청서 to accommodate annually changing 사업유형; c) Administrator screens must support 통합 실적관리, 통계 뷰 및 관리 업무. 3) Data management, reporting and analytics: a) Support quantitative analysis of 지원사업 실적 by 공고별, 지원기업별, 수행대리인별; b) 상담 통계 분석 including both 온라인 and 집계된 오프라인 상담 이력; c) Provide 엑셀 export and batch download functions for operational use and 제출서류; d) Enable mail notifications/통지서비스 using existing 원 인프라. 4) Deployment and integration constraints (non-functional/system architecture): a) System must be capable of deployment on an independent web server considering the 원's server infrastructure (독립된 웹서버에 전개할 수 있도록 구성); b) Must support integrated/linked operation with existing infrastructure and services (통합운영 환경 연계) including using existing mail services and mutual content/service linkage with the 원의 공식 홈페이지들; c) Provide online-accessible services (no physical/time constraint for 상담) and real-time record management for online consultations. 5) Procurement, evaluation and compliance constraints: a) Contract method: 제한경쟁입찰, 협상에 의한 계약; b) Participation restrictions: 대기업 참여 불허, 공동수급 및 하도급 불가 (단, 통상적 개발인력이 아닌 상용 SW·솔루션·콘텐츠 수집 지원인력 등은 하도급으로 보지 않음); c) Administrative requirements for bidders: G2B 입찰참가자격 등록, 소프트웨어사업자 등록(업종코드:1468) 등 명시된 입찰참가자격 준수; d) Proposal/평가 rules: 평가비율은 기술평가 + 가격평가(세부 배점은 별첨 기술심의 평가표에 따름), 사업관리자가 반드시 제안서 발표(프로젝트 매니저 직접 발표), 기술평가 시 각 평가위원 점수에서 최고·최저 제외 후 산술평균, 결과는 소수점 다섯째자리에서 반올림, 기술평가 관련 기타 규정은 조달청 규정 준수; e) 제출물 rules: 제출된 제안서는 변경 불가(단 추가자료 요청 가능) 및 제안서 페이지·형식 등 작성지침 준수. 6) Maintenance, support, schedule and contractual obligations: a) Contract period is defined as '계약체결일 [개월]' (document placeholder) and 과업종료 후 무상 하자지원 for '[개월]' (document placeholder) — contractor must provide the specified free defect-support period; b) 사업수행계획서 must include full project schedule; contractor must immediately report schedule delays and propose countermeasures; c) All costs for project execution, 유지관리, 하자보수, 품질보증 등 must be included in the price bid; d) 하도급 불허 to ensure responsibility for maintenance and quality (with stated exception for non-development support as above); e) Intellectual property: 사업추진 결과 발생한 지식재산권은 주관기관과 공동소유; f) Final 산출내역서 submission required from 최종낙찰자. 7) Standards/process constraints for software changes: a) If 과업내용 변경 or adjustments to 계약금액/기간 are needed, contractor must submit 소프트웨어사업 과업변경요청서 per 소프트웨어 진흥법 and 관련 지침; b) 과업심의위원회 procedures referenced for confirmation of 과업내용. 8) Proposal preparation constraints and deliverable format rules: a) Proposal written in Korean (한글 작성 원칙) with explanations for English acronyms; b) Proposal body recommended within 300 pages (150 sheets); c) 제안서 본문 및 별첨 증빙자료 제출 required; d) 홍보용 동영상 during presentation prohibited. 9) Security/other referenced requirements: a) The RFP references additional 보안·점검 체크리스트 및 보안관리 준수사항 in attachments (별표 누출금지 대상정보, 보안위반 처리기준, 사업자 보안관리 준수사항, 보안점검 체크리스트 등) which must be followed as part of 제안요청사항.

question: What specific system-upgrade requirements and problem resolutions must a proposal for the '운행정보기록 자동분석시스템 개량' project address? Provide a detailed, itemized list of required features and improvements derived from the RFP.
ground_truth: The requirements include: 1) Improve existing automatic-analysis process: revise the current automatic-analysis workflow to increase automatic-analysis rate and improve data consistency and accuracy (기존 자동분석 개선). 2) Add analysis support for new rolling stock: implement automatic-analysis capabilities for vehicles introduced after the original system (신조차량, 신형 전기동차, 이음 등) so these types can be analyzed automatically (신조차량 분석기능 추가). 3) Deploy a dedicated 운행정보 system server: build a new 운행정보 서버 (not the business portal) so vehicle-extracted data can be uploaded directly to that server (운행정보 시스템 서버 구축). 4) Implement system integration/automatic data transfer: enable the 운행정보 서버 to automatically receive operation data from other servers and perform analysis (시스템 연계 — 운행데이터 자동전송 및 연계). 5) Transition to large-volume data processing and fast text-based analysis: replace the current platform with a system capable of handling large data volumes and providing fast search and analysis, using a text-based analysis system (대용량 데이터 처리 시스템 전환 / 빠른 검색·분석 가능한 텍스트 기반 시스템). 6) Make education/extraction items configurable and aligned with recorded data: change the education-required/event item definitions so only items that are actually recorded in operation data are used (교육항목수정 — 교육필요 항목/이벤트 항목을 운행데이터에 기록되는 항목만으로 변경 반영). 7) Improve crew statistics management and editing: provide enterprise- and depot-level statistical management for all crew, and allow modification/editing of analysis results (승무원 통계관리 개선 — 사업소별 전 승무원 통계관리 및 분석결과에 따른 수정·편집 가능). 8) Resolve data upload and storage limitations for new-vehicle raw data: address portal storage limits that prevent registering original operation data for new rolling stock (신조차량 데이터 등재 불가 문제 해결). 9) Support decompression of split/compressed files: provide capability to decompress split/compressed high-speed vehicle operation data (분할압축 해제 기능 제공). 10) Enable editing and augmentation of analyzed statistics/results: add functions to edit, correct, or add to analysis outputs to improve management efficiency (편집·수정 기능 추가). 11) Ensure analysis time consistency: correct discrepancies between system-analyzed timestamps and original data timestamps so comparisons and 교육 are accurate (분석 시간 불일치 해소). 12) Expand extractable education/event items: increase the number and types of extractable 교육필요 항목 beyond the currently limited set (추출항목 확대 — 현재 제한된 항목들(예: 제한속도위반, 역전간, 중립, 비상 등) 외 항목 추가). 13) Replace paid/unsupported Hadoop management tooling (Cloudera): substitute the Cloudera-based management tool due to its move to paid licensing and end of technical support (솔루션 유료화 대응 — 대체 필요). 14) Reduce reliance on a heavy/overly large platform: migrate away from the current heavy platform that only handles text collection and cannot process very large datasets, to a lighter, scalable system suitable for big data (무거운 대형 플랫폼 문제 해결 / 시스템 경량화 및 확장성 확보).

question: What specific technical and non-functional requirements and architecture changes does the RFP mandate to improve the mobile office system's usability, responsiveness, and service continuity (covering application packaging, UI/UX, database, source code, messaging, server/infrastructure, and testing/operational constraints)?
ground_truth:
The RFP mandates the following specific technical and non-functional requirements and architecture changes:

1) Application packaging and installation
   - Merge existing security and workspace apps so users no longer must install three separate apps (VPN, MDM, 모바일오피스); provide a single package that installs/updates once and is ready to use.
   - Convert to a hybrid app (mobile web + native characteristics) to reduce app size and reduce frequency of app redistribution.
   - Migrate and consolidate the 6 업무전용앱 functions into the 모바일오피스 app and retire the separate 업무전용앱, so one app delivers diverse mobile 업무지원 기능.

2) UI/UX and usability
   - Perform user-centered new UI/UX design that allows personalization of the main screen (users can compose main screen with frequently used menus).
   - Apply intuitive UI/UX based on benchmarking of commercial apps and latest trends to improve convenience.
   - Reduce unused/irrelevant menu clutter (current system has 28 menus with some unused by individuals).

3) Source code and performance (response speed, stability)
   - Perform full-scale source code refactoring/rewrite to improve response times and minimize errors (frequent app stops/crashes must be addressed).
   - Identify and tune slow database queries that take 2 seconds or longer; apply DB tuning such as indexing to improve search and query speed.

4) Database standardization and data requirements
   - Apply a database standardization policy across 96 tables: standardize table names, column names, and column sizes.
   - Select and tune slow SQL (queries over 2 seconds) for performance improvement; use indexing where appropriate (DB튜닝 via 색인화 noted).

5) Messaging and collaboration features
   - Strengthen messenger functionality to support exception/incident response, implementing some commercial messenger features.
   - Required messenger improvements include group chat improvements, chat-room announcement (공지) functionality, and the ability to call the other party from a chat.
   - Consider adopting a mobile messenger solution to meet these requirements.

6) Server and infrastructure (service continuity / redundancy)
   - Replace WEB, WAS, and DB servers that have reached or exceeded their lifecycle.
   - Implement server redundancy (서버 이중화) by expanding WEB and WAS servers to enable load distribution and service continuity.
   - Upgrade JEUS version because the current JEUS Standard edition does not support server clustering; the JEUS upgrade is required to enable clustering and thus redundancy.

7) Testing, rollout and timeline constraints
   - Project duration: within 6 months from start (사업기간: 착수일로부터 6개월 이내).
   - Development must include apps for aOS, iOS, and webview (schedule lists 앱 개발 (aOS, iOS, 웹뷰)).
   - Include unit, integration, and system testing and a phase of pilot operation and optimization prior to go-live (단위·통합 테스트, 시범운영 및 최적화).

8) Functional improvements and scope
   - Improve/extend existing functions and develop new features based on survey results (38 total suggestions, 18 to be reflected).
   - Ensure common mobile-office functions (전자결재, 메신저, 직원검색, 내부메일 등) remain available and performance-improved after consolidation.

9) System equipment and procurement items (high-level)
   - The RFP includes system equipment requirements entries (ECR-001..ECR-004 etc.) indicating procurement of 모바일오피스 서버, WEB/WAS, server OS and other hardware/software/network items necessary to meet the objectives.

10) Non-functional goals
   - Improve user convenience and processing speed to expand mobile work support.
   - Ensure service continuity via load distribution and redundancy so that server failures do not render mobile 업무지원 apps unusable.

All items above are stated or implied explicitly in the RFP text and form the technical and non-functional requirements and architecture changes required for the 모바일오피스 시스템 고도화 project.

question: What specific functional, technical, data, security, quality, constraint, project-management, and project-support requirements and deliverables must a proposal address for the '예약발매시스템 개량 ISMP 용역' (Reservation & Ticketing System Modernization) project, and how do those requirements map to the system problems and project objectives described in the RFP?
ground_truth: The requirements include: 1) Consulting requirements (CSR, 20 items): • Project initiation and plan establishment (CSR-001). • Project organization and methodology (methodology, 수행조직 편성). • Comprehensive environment analysis (domestic/foreign industry trends, 대내·외 환경분석) and benchmarking. • Business (업무) and information-technology (정보기술) current-state analyses (업무 및 정보기술 현황 분석). • Identification of improvement needs and functional/technical requirements (기능적·기술적 요건 도출), including reviews of revenue-management and product-management integration (수익관리·상품관리 등 시스템 통합 검토). • Target information-system architecture and next‑generation model design (목표시스템 아키텍처 정의, 차세대 모델 설계). • Infrastructure architecture design and cloud/신기술 연계 고려 (인프라 아키텍처 구성 모델 설계, 클라우드 인프라 연계 기반 최적화 등). • Data and technical linkage strategies with existing systems (기존 시스템과의 데이터 및 기술 연계 방안). • Information-protection and personal-data management framework (시스템 정보보호 및 개인정보 관리체계 강화 방안). • Comprehensive system-improvement solution and master plan (마스터플랜 수립, 시스템 개선방안 도출). • Produce required deliverables: 수행제안서, 과업지시서, 제안요청서, 사업계획서, 소요예산·분담계획, 종합설계 산출물, 보고서 및 보고회, 업체선정·평가 지원 (제안요청서 및 과업지시서 제작, 시스템 구축 업체 선정·평가 지원, 보고서 검수 및 보고회). • Emphasis on practical, site-based collaboration with stakeholders and weekly progress checks (현장 기반 업무 추진, 주간 단위 진행상황 점검). 2) Data requirements (DAR, 3 items): • Data quality items (데이터 품질 항목). • Identification of data-quality evaluation targets (품질 평가 대상). • Target/threshold values for data quality (목표값). • Data-status and data-volume analysis (데이터 현황 분석) to support optimized system design for growing data. 3) Security requirements (SER, 3 items): • Requirements to ensure confidentiality and integrity of information assets (정보자산의 기밀성·무결성 요건). • Detailed security management expectations covering: common security provisions, personnel security for project members, document/material security, equipment security, internal/external network access controls, and special security clauses (공통사항, 참여인원 보안관리, 자료 보안관리, 장비 보안관리, 내·외부망 접근 보안관리, 보안특약 조항). • Emphasis on strengthening security for external integrations and changing technical environments. 4) Quality requirements (QUR, 2 items): • Quality measures for consulting outputs and verification of consulting results (컨설팅 결과와 품질). • Expectations for deliverable quality and acceptance criteria. 5) Constraint requirements (COR, 3 items): • Constraints and compliance obligations (제약 및 준수 요건) that the project must adhere to (e.g., procurement/contracting 방식: 제한경쟁입찰·협상에 의한 계약, 법률·정책 연계 고려). 6) Project Management requirements (PMR, 9 items): • Management methodology and phase‑by‑phase execution plans (관리 방법 및 단계별 수행방안). • Scheduling and milestone structure (M+0 ~ M+4 등 추진일정), resource and budget estimation (소요자원 및 예산 산출), progress control and weekly coordination (주간 점검 및 지속적 의견 교환). • Risk assessment and mitigation planning (위험 요소 평가 및 대응 전략 수립). • Support for vendor selection and evaluation processes and governance (시스템 구축 업체 선정·평가 지원). 7) Project Support requirements (PSR, 2 items): • Project support measures such as assistance in producing RFP/SOW (제안요청서 및 과업지시서 제작 지원). • Support in report review, reporting sessions and vendor evaluation (보고서 검수·보고회, 업체 선정·평가 지원). 8) Scope and deliverables (from 사업범위): • Establish project organization and execution plan for system modernization. • Analyze industry trends and current-state business/IT to derive improvement requirements. • Define IT/architecture requirements, integration options with revenue/product systems, and technical/functional requirement set. • Prepare implementation plan for next‑generation model and cloud/infra architecture, including separation or re‑procurement options. • Produce comprehensive design outputs (종합설계 산출물), proposals, SOW, budgets and resource plans, and support procurement/selection. Mapping to identified problems and objectives: • Addresses aging software/hardware and version mismatches by requiring full current‑state analysis, middleware/framework version update plans, and target architecture design. • Responds to infrastructure obsolescence and NIS criticisms through infra architecture redesign, cloud integration options, and equipment/security management clauses. • Tackles inefficient resource partitioning and lack of optimized design for data growth via data‑status analysis, infra optimization, and next‑generation model design that considers big data. • Mitigates security gaps for external linkages and changing tech environments through detailed security requirements (SER) and network/access controls. • Resolves limited external/platform integration and customer service constraints by specifying platform-level expansion, external platform 연동, and functional requirements for improved reservation/external API support. • Improves operational efficiency and integration with revenue management by explicitly requiring evaluation of system integration with 수익관리·상품관리. • Compensates for lack of data-analysis capability by including data-quality requirements and analysis tasks to enable analytics and decision support. • Ensures governance and execution through project-management and support requirements (PMR/PSR), weekly checks, and deliverables for procurement support. • Achieves project objectives (master plan, stable public service, cost reduction, risk minimization, and platform/빅데이터 readiness) by delivering a master plan, comprehensive design, security and data management frameworks, budget/resource plans, and vendor-selection support as specified above.

question: What is the detailed Scope of Work for the 통합정보시스템 고도화 용역 — list each module to be newly built or improved and, for each, the specific functions and sub-processes the RFP requires?
ground_truth: The scope of work in the RFP includes the following modules and their specific required functions/sub-processes: 1) 기관생명윤리 (Institutional Human Research Ethics / IRB) — 신규구축: a) Clinical research review application (임상연구 심의 신청), b) Receipt/acceptance of clinical research review applications and result registration (심의 접수 및 결과등록), c) Notification of review results (심의 결과 통보), d) IRB registry and information management (임상연구 대장 및 정보 관리), e) Change/amendment application and history management (변경신청 및 이력관리), f) Submission and management of clinical research result reports (결과보고서 제출 및 관리). 2) 동물실험윤리 (Animal Experiment Ethics / IACUC) — 신규구축: a) Animal experiment plan approval application (동물실험계획 승인 신청서), b) Receipt/acceptance and review result notification for animal experiment plans (계획 접수 및 심사결과 통보), c) Animal experiment plan registry and information management (계획 대장 및 정보 관리), d) Management of approval-change applications (변경승인신청 관리), e) Management of experiment animal/materials intake requests (실험동물 물품 반입신청서 관리), f) Submission of experiment termination reports (동물실험 종료보고서 제출), g) Submission of carcass disposal result reports (사체처리결과서 제출). 3) 국가연구개발사업 연구비 사용기준 준수 (Compliance with R&D Project Research-Fund Usage Standards) — 신규구축: a) Pre-meeting plan (사전 회의 개최(안)) application (사전회의 개최 계획(안) 신청), b) Legal/organization research-fund card payment applications (법인/연구비카드 지급신청) and linkage between pre-meeting plan and payment (사전회의 개최(안) 연계 신청), c) Purchase-dedicated card usage application and ledger management including storage, lending, return (구매전용카드 사용신청 및 대장관리(보관, 대여, 반납)), d) Electronic (tax) invoice issuance request handling (전자(세금)계산서 발행 요청). 4) 연구계획 관리 (Research Plan Management) — 신규구축: a) Register and manage target technology readiness levels (TRL, BRL, ATL) for major projects (주요사업 기술완성수준 목표 등록 관리), b) Register TRL/BRL/ATL stage for commissioned (수탁) projects (수탁사업 기술완성수준 단계 등록 관리), c) Manage technology readiness levels within research agreements (연구협약내 기술완성수준 관리). 5) 전자결재연동 (Electronic Approval Form Integration) — 전자결재연동: a) Integrate various new application forms (10 types) with the electronic approval system for end-to-end processing (각종 신규 신청서(10종) 전자결재 연계 처리). 6) 연구노트 관리 (Research Notebook Management) — 기능개선 (function improvement): a) Research notebook ledger application covering new issuance, lending, return, and handover (연구노트 대장(신규, 대여, 반납, 인수인계) 신청), b) Ledger/list management for notebook operations (신규, 대여, 반납, 인수인계) (연구노트 대장 목록 관리), c) Per-project research-notebook status management (연구과제별 연구노트 현황(탭) 관리). Additional cross-cutting/system considerations implicit in the scope: - Modules are to be newly built or integrated considering interoperability with the existing integrated information system and external services (기존 통합정보시스템과의 상호 연계 고려). - Emphasis on standardizing paper/manual processes and non-integrated data to improve sharing and management (수기처리 및 연계되지 않는 업무 자료 표준화·체계화). - User-centric UI/UX and reuse of existing infrastructure are required (사용자 편의성 고려한 맞춤형 UI/UX, 기 구축 시스템 및 인프라 활용).

question: What are the detailed functional and deliverable requirements for (A) the digital quality-inspection element analysis, (B) the digital quality-inspection tool to be developed, and (C) the quality-error database and query improvements, including required analyses, validation checks, automation proposals, and contractual/submission obligations described in the RFP?
ground_truth:
The requirements include: 1) Digital quality-inspection element analysis (must deliver analysis and proposed methods for digital validation):
   1.1) Paper-chart file (PCC) structure analysis and digital inspection method derivation: analyze PCC file structure and detailed data composition; analyze linkage structures among geometry, objects and attribute information; analyze elements for checking consistency between large-scale charts and adjacent charts; analyze chart components such as chart frame, title groups, and caution/notice items; analyze text standards, masking, symbols, colors, and name (toponym) elements.
   1.2) Electronic chart (바다내비용 전자해도) digital-error inspection method derivation: review/analyze latest electronic-chart production manuals and standards for 바다내비용 전자해도 and derive a digital validation/verification approach for electronic charts.
   1.3) Navigation-warning (항행통보) reflection information quality-inspection method derivation: define methods to verify and display 항행통보 information per chart; derive digital verification methods for results of reflecting 항행통보 on charts.
   1.4) Quality improvement element analysis and automation proposals: analyze elements for quality improvement and present automation approaches to reduce manual inspection workload and increase efficiency.
   1.5) Consideration of customer-satisfaction aspects for navigation-publication quality management.

2) Digital quality-inspection tool (functional requirements):
   2.1) Develop digital inspection functions for paper charts’ key objects (point-type features): perform scale-dependent positional checks and attribute checks for point objects (i.e., verify position and attributes according to scale).
   2.2) Implement checks for incorporation of maritime place names (해양지명) in paper charts.
   2.3) Provide functionality to support the digital verification approaches derived in the element analysis (e.g., consistency checks across adjacent scales, verification of chart components, text/symbol/color/masking validation).
   2.4) Present and deliver proposals for automation of quality checks based on the above analyses.

3) Quality-error database (DB) and query improvements (requirements):
   3.1) Reclassify and subdivide the existing navigation-publication quality-error DB (i.e., rebuild the DB taxonomy and granularity of error categories).
   3.2) Improve the error-information query/lookup functions (i.e., enhance search and retrieval of quality-error information for faster and more effective quality management support).

4) Deliverable, format, and contractual/operational obligations related to the work and outputs:
   4.1) All materials and deliverables produced during the project must be provided as Korean-language documents and their digital files; English versions must be provided only if the client requests them.
   4.2) The contractor must treat all provided client materials as usable only for this project, must not disclose or leak them externally, and must return or dispose of them as required; the contractor is responsible for security and safety measures to prevent theft, loss, damage, or corruption of materials.
   4.3) If damage or loss occurs to materials, the contractor bears responsibility and must coordinate remedial actions with the client.
   4.4) The contractor must confirm third-party patent usage in advance and is responsible for any intellectual property usage issues.
   4.5) The contractor must submit detailed post-change documentation when project or contract contents change (including before/after comparisons) and provide a detailed breakdown (by task and by personnel) of work, function-points (FP) or man-months (M/M), and labor costs; once submitted these detailed calculation sheets cannot be arbitrarily modified.
   4.6) Inspection of delivered outputs will be performed by client staff or staff delegated by the client.
   4.7) The contractor must comply with client directives within the scope of the RFP and negotiate with the client on matters not explicitly specified.
   4.8) After project completion, the contractor must provide rework/review/補完 if necessary without additional charge when related issues are found.
   4.9) The defect/liability warranty period for the final deliverables is one (1) year from the date the project is considered complete (date of final deliverable acceptance).

5) Project management and milestones (what the contractor must plan/deliver):
   5.1) Prepare and submit a detailed execution plan at project start (착수) including planned schedules and phases; present reports at kickoff, interim (중간) and final (최종) review meetings.
   5.2) In the execution plan include detailed planned processes for the analyses, tool development, DB restructuring, and proposed automation.

6) Evaluation/selection constraints that affect requirements and proposals:
   6.1) The procurement method is restricted bid (negotiated contract) with technical evaluation weighting 80% and price evaluation weighting 20%; proposals should therefore emphasize technical completeness (analyses, methods, tool functions, DB design) consistent with the RFP requirements.

Note: All items above are drawn directly from the RFP sections on 과업 범위, 상세 과업 요구사항, 일반사항, 계약상대자의 의무, 계약의 변경, 기타사항, and 과업 추진방안. No requirements beyond those stated in the RFP have been added.

question: Summarize the functional and non-functional system requirements and design objectives defined in the RFP for the '트랙운영 학사정보시스템 고도화' (track-based academic information system enhancement).
ground_truth: The requirements include: 1) Implement a system to support track制度 curriculum reform and standardized operation management, covering end-to-end processes from curriculum development through course completion and grade recording (교과과정 개발에서 성적 이수까지). 2) High‑level integration capability: the system must be 고도화 (upgraded) so it can be linked with the current comprehensive information system, specifically including curriculum, course registration (수강신청), grades (성적), and student records/academic affairs management (학적관리) and other related modules. 3) Non-functional requirement — scalability and flexibility: create an environment that considers 확장성 및 유연성 so future extensions are possible and changes are manageable. 4) Maintainability: the environment must allow for 용이한 유지보수 (easy maintenance). 5) Usability and access: consider information accessibility and user convenience for diverse user groups (교수, 직원, 학생), i.e., professor-, staff-, and student‑centric ease of use. 6) Operational goals reflected as expected effects: effectively support operation and management of track‑based curricula (트랙기반 교육과정의 운영 및 관리 체계 지원), foster a 교수자·학습자 중심 educational environment, and establish an academic‑operations system able to respond to university system reorganization (학사운영 시스템을 통해 대학 체제 개편에 대한 대응체계 확립).
